name: search_jobs
description: Gets a list of jobs, intelligently sorted by a number of factors such as trendiness, uniqueness, newness, etc.

page.description: The page number to load. 0 is the first page.

descending.description: Whether to show descending results, defaults to false.

company.description: Only get jobs for these companies.

level.description: The experience level required for the job.

location.description: The job location to get (you can include flexible/remote jobs from here).

name: search_job_by_id
description: Get an individual job by its id.

job_id.description: The id of the job to search, which can be gained from search_jobs.

name: search_companies
description: Gets a list of companies, intelligently sorted by a number of factors such as trendiness, uniqueness, newness, etc.

page.description: The page number to load. 0 is the first page.

descending.description: Whether to show descending results, defaults to false.

location.description: The office location to get (you can include flexible/remote offices from here)

name: search_company_by_id
description: Get an individual company by its id.

company_id.description: The id of the company to search, which can be gained from search_companies.

name: ask_to_user
description: You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.

question.description: The question you want to ask to user.

name: finish
description: Finish the task and give your answer.
